Discography:

End Of Time – 16 track demos (4 demos 2009-2011)

(symphonic rock, synth rock, space rock, progressive rock, score music, metal, psychodelic, electronic music)

https://www.box.com/s/ d4873abdcbe0fc7859fc

Spiritual Fire – 7 track demos (2 demos 2012)

(symphonic rock, space rock, progressive rock, heavy metal, progressive metal, power metal, synth pop, score music)

https://www.box.com/s/ cc148c373f6080120c53

Erotica – 9 track demo (2013)

https://app.box.com/s/98vne3fe3wlnbpui70m7

Brand New Day Of Eternal Dance (as Neonize – Dalibor Mladenovic side project) – 5 track demo – 2013

(synth pop, nu disco, progressive, eurodance, fussion, score music)

https://www.box.com/s/gd0z3dt2vl9h3b88oq5f

Walk On Air – 3 track demo – 2004

(new age, ambiental, pop)

https://www.box.com/s/ d4873abdcbe0fc7859fc

Step Close To Angels – 4 track demo – 2003

(new age, ambiental, pop)

(photo: Neon Eyes / Celestial Prophecy And Sacred Serenity 2013)

Basic Info:

a) Our Music: We want to do creative and sincere music, regardless of the current trendy upheaval!!!!!!! This is definitely not a kind of music for ego boosting!

b) Members:

Neon Eyes line-up 2013:

Dalibor Mladenovic – keyboards, music, lyrics

Tomislava Turcin – vocals

Darko Mares – guitars

Fedra Pavelic – back vocals

Nikola Kahriman – bass

Dominik Turkovic – drums

Guests(session musicians):

Lanzarot(Death Of Folk) – guitars, production

Mate(Besthial) – guitars

Vlado Soldatek(Cold Snap) – guitars

Kora Pavelic – vocals

Slavko Vincek – guitars

Igor Kisicek – bass

Kresimir Susec – bass

Srecko Dikic – drums

c) Genre: combination of synth pop, sympho/space/prog rock, new age / ambiental, psychodelic and melodic heavy metal music

d) Hometown, Country: Varaždin, Croatia

e): Label status: happily unsigned

f) Influences: Ultravox (Midge Ure), Marillion, Saga, IQ, Arjen Lucassen, Eloy, Lana Lane, Alphaville, early Nightwish, Jean Michel Jarre, Vangelis, Kitaro, Mike Oldfield, Enya, A-HA, Kraftwerk, Space, Gary Numan, Tangerine Dream, early Porcupine Tree, early Dimmu Borgir, Arsen Dedic, Zoran Predin, EKV, Laura Branigan, Brad Fiedel, early Dismal Euphony, Bal Sagoth, early Cradle Of Filth, early Dream Theater, Savatage, early Blind Guardian, Ivanhoe, early Porcupine Tree, Blondie, Talk Talk, Kornelije Kovac, Laza Ristovski, Gershon Kingsley, Xanakis, Leb i Sol, Bodan Arsovski, Kokan Dimuševski,

Yanni, Julee Cruise, Richard Clayderman, Paul Engemann, Zdravko Colic, Matia Bazar, Modern Talking, Michael Sembello, Renaissance, Goldfrapp, Air, Portishead, Ladytron, Massive Attack, early Royksopp, early Moonspell, early Amorphis, early Paradise Lost, early My Dying Bride, Death, Atheist, Cynic, early Nevermore, early And Oceans, Negura Bunget, Ancient, early Opeth, early Iced Earth, Orphaned Land, early Tiamat, Samael, Therion, Eurythmics, Jan Hammer, Rick Wakeman, Oliver Wakeman, Arena, Clive Nolan, Alice Cooper, Judas Priest, Saxon, Vixen, early WASP, Kim Wilde, Irene Cara, Madonna, Shadow Gallery, Kate Bush, Frameshift, Pink Floyd, Led Zeppelin, Uriah Heep, Colosseum, Sonata Arctica, Rhapsody, Deep Purple, ACT, Eternity X, Giorgio Moroder, Ennio Morricone, early The Gathering, early Morgana Lefay, Horner, Goldsmith, Zimmer, Hertzog, Oliver Onions, Mozart, Bach, Vivaldi, Beethoven, Chopin, Stravinski, Jeff Waine, The Sparks, Alan Parsons, Duran Duran, Spock`s Beard, early Thyrfing, Dean Martin, Sinatra, Barry de Vorzon, Magnum, Journey, Styx, Iron Maiden, early Manowar, Virgin Steele, Color Theory, Cairo, Jethro Tull, Omega, early Angra, Labyrinth, Eldritch, Empty Tremor, Introitus, Spheric Universe Experiance, Annihilator, Forbidden, Dreamscape, Andromeda and many many more…

Cover Artwork on Spiritual Fire: Tomislava Turčin

Design on Spiritual Fire: Tihomir Koren

Photo cover on End Of Time: Marta Budinski Mladenović

Neon Eyes logo by: Mario Štrlek (Frayn)

(On Photo: Neon Eyes on Spring 2011. Photo by: Neven Đorđević)

Biography:

Neon Eyes is a symphonic space pop/rock/metal band from Varazdin(Croatia) which in its opus combines genres like synth rock, progressive rock, ambiental music, psychedelic music and melodic metal. The band was formed in 2003. by keyboard player Dalibor Mladenovic and vocalist Fedra Pavelic. Through the years there were some changes in the line-up. Fedra left the band in 2012. as the main vocal but continues to appear as guest back vocals on albums and live, Tomislava Turcin joins the band as the new lead vocalist.

Contact: neoneyes7@gmail.com
